original: Theocracies, Holy Orders and Mercenaries cannot create kingdoms!
translation: 神权国、骑士团和雇佣兵团无法建立王国！

original: Merchant Republics and Patricians cannot usurp kingdoms or empires
translation: 商业共和国和贵人无法篡夺王国或者帝国头衔

original: Game State is corrupted. Please restart the game.
translation: 游戏状态已损坏。请重启游戏。

original: Independent Tribal or Nomadic Rulers do not get liege levies from their vassal tribes
translation: 独立的部落或游牧领主不会从他们的附属部落那里得到征召兵
正在进攻中的玩家角色

original: You are an attacker in this battle
translation: 你是这场战役的一个进攻者
正在防守中的玩家角色

original: You are a defender in this battle
translation: 你是这场战役的一个防御者
设此头衔为你的主头衔。

original: I can make this my capital.
You can only have one Plot active at a time. Choosing a new Plot will cancel your current one.
translation: 你同一时间只能激活一个密谋。选择一个新的密谋将会取消你现在的密谋。

original: You can only have one Ambition active at a time. Choosing a new Ambition will cancel your current one.
translation: 你同一时间只能激活一个野心。选择一个新的野心将会取消你现在的野心。

original: You can only have one Focus active at a time. Choosing a new Focus will cancel your current one.
translation: 你同一时间只能拥有一个生活重心。选择一个新的重心将会取消你现在的重心。

original: The following Special Character Actions are available:\n$LIST$
translation: 下列特殊角色行为可用：\n$LIST$

original: The following Special Title Actions are available:\n$LIST$
translation: 下述特殊头衔行为可用：\n$LIST$

original: The following Special Holding Actions are available:\n$LIST$
translation: 下述特殊地产行为可用：\n$LIST$

original: Final Damage Values: §Y$DAMAGE$§! Damage (£1£), §Y$MORALE_DAMAGE$§! Morale Damage (£2£)
translation: 最终伤害值：§Y$DAMAGE$§! 伤害(£1£)，§Y$MORALE_DAMAGE$§! 士气伤害(£2£)

original: Total Remaining Troops\n§GClick to show composition of Flanks§!
translation: 剩余总兵力\n§G点击显示侧翼的组成§!

original:
Damage per Soldier: §Y$DAMAGE$§!
Defence per Soldier: §Y$DEFENCE$§!

Total Damage: §Y$TOTAL_DAMAGE$§!
Total Defence: §Y$TOTAL_DEFENCE$§!
translation:
单兵伤害：§Y$DAMAGE$§!
单兵防御：§Y$DEFENCE$§!

总伤害：§Y$TOTAL_DAMAGE$§!
总防御：§Y$TOTAL_DEFENCE$§!

original: Average morale in this flank: $MORALE$ (§Y+$DELTA$§W / week)\nTotal Morale: §Y$TOTAL_MORALE$§!
This county does not belong to any region
translation: 此省份不属于任何一个区域

original: Press §YLeft Click§W to select next region.
translation: 点击§Y鼠标左键§W以选取下一个区域。
点击§Y鼠标右键§W以取消选择区域。

original: This county belongs to the following regions:

You currently have one unhappy Vassal. You can find this Vassal by clicking on your portrait and open the 'Vassals' tab. Try to increase the Opinion of this Vassal to a positive number. You can increase the Opinion of your Vassals towards you in several ways, for example by giving them more land (but do try to hold as much land as your Demesne Limit allows!). You can also give them an Honorary Title, or send them a gift. All this can be done in the Diplomacy Menu.
translation: 现在你有一个不喜欢你的封臣。你可以通过点击自己头像并选择「封臣」选项卡来查看。试着使他们的好感为正数。你可以通过数种办法增加封臣对你的好感，比如给他们更多土地（你自己最好拿满直辖上限！）。你也可以给予荣誉头衔或者直接送礼。所有这些均可在外交界面完成。

original: When you have found a good character to marry, right-click on their portrait to open the Diplomacy Menu. Here you may ask the Liege of your intended about the possibility of arranging a marriage. The Diplomacy Menu is the main way to interact with other characters. Go ahead and arrange the marriage!
translation: 当你找到一个好的婚姻对象时，右击其头像以打开外交界面。这时你要询问你意中人的领主以得知与你婚姻对象结姻的可能性。外交印象是影响其他角色的主要方法。那么去协商婚姻吧！

original: You now have a Claim and it's time to let slip the dogs of War! Click on Canarias province and right-click the Ruler Portrait in the County View. Select 'Declare War' in the Diplomacy Menu and the 'Claim Canarias' Casus Belli. Send the War Declaration.
translation: 你现在拥有了一个宣称权，那么现在就是开动战争机器的时候了！点击加那利并在省份界面中右键点击该省统治者头像。在选择外交界面的「宣战」选项及「宣称加那利」的宣战理由以发出宣战布告。

original: You are now over your Vassal Limit, meaning you have more Vassals than you can control. Your Vassals will then give you reduced Taxes and Levies, and you might even lose some Vassals when you die and your Heir takes over. In the long term you can increase your Vassal Limit by increasing your Diplomacy, but in the short term you can Transfer Vassalage so that you have fewer Direct Vassals. You can do this by clicking on the character you want to give Vassals to, and open their Diplomacy Menu. The target character must be of a higher tier than the Vassal you wish to give away.
translation: 你超出了封臣上限，意味着你有超出你控制能力以外的过多封臣。你的封臣将会给你更少的税收和兵员，而在你死时，也有封臣独立的风险，长期来说，你可以通过增加自身外交能力增加封臣上限；但短期来说转封封臣是个好办法——选择一个你希望接受转封的封臣，打开外交界面。接受转封的目标需要比你希望转封的角色头衔等级更高。

original: One of your children is now old enough to be Tutored by a Guardian. By opening your Diplomacy Menu you can select the 'Educate Child' option. A Guardian will be automatically suggested, but feel free to click on the suggested Guardian in order to choose another one if you wish. You will want a Guardian with good Traits and Attributes, or use this opportunity and let a Vassal that dislike you to get the honor of becoming the Guardian of your child.
translation: 当你的孩子年纪够大时，可以送去由监护人教育。点开外交界面你可以选择「教育儿童」选项，会自动推荐一名监护人，但只要你想，你完全可以点击推荐监护人的头像来选择另外一名监护人。你或许会希望监护人有优良的属性和特质，不过也可以利用这个机会让不喜欢你的封臣接受教育你孩子的荣誉，改变对你的态度。

original: You are now over your Demesne Limit, meaning you have more Holdings than is seemly for you to rule personally. Your Vassals will dislike you for being over this limit, so you need to do something about it, and soon! In the long term, you can increase your demesne limit by increasing your Stewardship Attribute (and your wife's), but in the short term you need to give some of your Titles to your Vassals. You can do this by clicking on the character you want to give Titles to, and open their Diplomacy Menu. Look in the Character Finder or in the Court Tab in your Character View to find suitable characters.
translation: 你的直辖领超出了上限，这意味着你手握的领地超出了你能管理的数量。你的封臣对此会感到不悦，因此你得尽快采取措施！长期来说，你可以通过增强自身财政属性提升直辖领上限，配偶的属性同样也有一定作用。但短期来说分封一部分这些头衔给你的封臣才是最有效的。可以点击想要授予头衔的角色并开启他们的外交界面来完成。用角色查找功能或是你角色自身的宫廷界面也可以帮助你找到合适的人选。

original: You are now ready to make Peace. To do this, click on the War icon in the bottom right of the screen. You can also right-click the portrait of the character you are fighting and open their Diplomacy Menu.
translation: 现在你准备议和了。要想议和，点击在屏幕右下方的战争标志。你也可以右击敌方君主头像以打开外交界面。

original: These troops will always be raiding.
translation: 这支部队将会一直劫掠。

original: Grant a landed title and settle the adventurer
translation: 授予实地头衔以安置这个冒险者

original: Grant one of your landed titles to settle an adventurer. This will significantly improve their opinion of you. Settling an adventurer will stop them from raiding you, and the adventurer will also prevent other raiders from attacking for a long time.
translation: 授予你名下的一个实地头衔以安置一个冒险者。这将极大地提高他们对你的好感。安置冒险者将使他们不再劫掠你，这个冒险者也将在很长时间内阻止别的劫掠者继续攻击我们。

original: Select a title to grant to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§W.
The capital will change from §Y$CURRENT$§W to §Y$NEW$§W.

translation: 随着头衔授予，以下封臣将同时转移：

original: §RMaking [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a $TITLE$ will disqualify [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] from the succession!§!
translation: §R让[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]成为一个$TITLE$将使[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]失去继承权！§!
接受了安置冒险者的提议

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W settled the adventurer §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W by giving [Recipient.GetHerHim] the [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName].
Grant the §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W and all titles under it to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W, increasing [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §G$OPINION$§W.
translation: 将§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W头衔和其法理的所有下级头衔授予§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W，增加[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你 §G$OPINION$§! 好感。

original: Decadence lost from grant to dynasty member: §G$DECADENCE$%§! (the effect is relative to the dynasty's current Decadence.)
translation: 由于授予家族成员土地，腐化度将减少：§G$DECADENCE$%§!（效果与该家族当前腐化度相关。）

original: Settling an adventurer will significantly reduce the risk of further raid attempts against you for a long time.
translation: 安置一个冒险者将显著减少未来一段时间被劫掠的风险。

original: Cannot destroy contested title during war
translation: 无法在战争中销毁争议头衔

original: This county has recently been settled by a raider adventurer.
translation: 最近一个劫掠冒险者定居在了这个省份。

original: These troops will start off as raiders.
translation: 该部队将开始作为劫掠者行动。

original: Click the portrait. All characters have a view like this. This is the King of Scotland, and here you can see that his parents and grandparents are dead. He has three children and three siblings.
translation: 点击头像。所有的角色都有一个类似的窗口。这是苏格兰国王，而你在这能看到他的父母、祖父母已故，他有三个孩子和三个兄弟姐妹。

original: Current realm levy difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! lower than §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!之间当前领地征召兵差异少于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Current realm levy difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!之间当前领地征召兵的差异至少为 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Maximum realm levy difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! lower than §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!之间最大领地征召兵的差异少于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Maximum realm levy difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!和§Y$SECOND$§!之间最大领地征召兵的差异至少为 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Send §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! away to seek experience, fame and fortune as a mercenary, taking some soldiers from your current levy with [Root.GetHerHim] as a starting force. You will be able to recall [Root.GetHerHim] to §Y[From.Capital.GetName]§! at any time, and hopefully by then [Root.GetSheHe] will have brought honor to your dynasty by amassing a suitably impressive amount of gold and prestige.
translation: 将§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!送走，去作为雇佣兵寻求经验、名声和财富，从你当前征召兵中带走一部分作为[Root.GetHerHim]的启动兵力。你可以随时召唤[Root.GetHerHim]回到§Y[From.Capital.GetName]§!，并希望[Root.GetSheHe]到时将会积累起可观的金钱和威望，为你的家族带来荣誉。

original: This holding is used to refill mercenary bands
translation: 这一地产被用来补充雇佣兵大队

original: Garrison of entire demesne is more or equal to
translation: 整个直辖领的守备部队大于或等于

original: Garrison of entire demesne is less than
translation: 整个直辖领的守备部队少于

original: We offer you the landed title of [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName] in exchange for your protection against future raids in this area.
translation: 本座提议给予你实地头衔[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]，作为交换，你要在未来保护此地区免遭劫掠。

original: [Actor.GetBestName] wants to offer us the landed title of [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName] in exchange for our protection.
translation: [Actor.GetBestName]提议给予我们实地头衔[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]，作为交换，我们需提供保护。
拒绝了安置冒险者的提议

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W refused §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W's offer to settle in [Actor.GetHerHis] lands.
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W拒绝§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W的关于定居到[Actor.GetHerHis]土地的提议。

original: Order [Root.GetFirstName] to disband [Root.GetHerHis] mercenary band and return home.
translation: 命令[Root.GetFirstName]解散[Root.GetHerHis]雇佣兵大队并回到家乡。

original: Has been leading the company for five years\n
translation: 已经带领该雇佣兵团五年了\n

original: I accept your offer of settling down.
translation: 我接受你的提议，定居于此。

original: I refuse to accept your offer of settling down.
translation: 我拒绝你的提议，不定居于此。

original: [New.GetTitledFirstName] announced the formal annulment of [From.GetTitledFirstName]s marriage with [Root.GetTitledName].

translation: 满足条件采用针对§Y$CHARACTER$§!的决议§Y$DECISION$§!

original: NOT eligible to take §Y$DECISION$§! decision against §Y$CHARACTER$§!
translation: 不满足条件采用针对§Y$CHARACTER$§!的决议§Y$DECISION$§!
满足条件采用对§Y$TITLE$§!的决议§Y$DECISION$§!

original: NOT eligible to take §Y$DECISION$§! decision for §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: 不满足条件采用对§Y$TITLE$§!的决议§Y$DECISION$§!
满足条件采用在§Y$SETTLEMENT$§!的决议§Y$DECISION$§!

original: NOT eligible to take §Y$DECISION$§! decision in §Y$SETTLEMENT$§!
translation: 不满足条件采用在§Y$SETTLEMENT$§!的决议§Y$DECISION$§!

original: [From.GetBestName] has gathered a band of warriors with the intention to raid foreign lands to create a fortune of [From.GetPossPronoun] own.
translation: [From.GetBestName]已经聚集一队战士打算劫掠邻国的土地以创造[From.GetPossPronoun]自己的财富。

original: The [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has declared [From.GetHerHis] intentions of trying to seize land from your realm by force with [From.GetHerHis] band of thieves and robbers.
translation: [GetRootFromInsult][From.GetBestName]公开宣布[From.GetHerHis]意图：通过[From.GetHerHis]那群不法之徒从你的国度攫取土地。

original:
Dear [GetFromReverseRelation],
[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has smiled upon me the during my recent adventures. I now have so much wealth that I'm having trouble spending it all. However I would like to have a realm of my own fitting for a warrior of my rank, therefore I propose a small exchange.

Signed,
your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
「亲爱的[GetFromReverseRelation]，
[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]已经在我最近的冒险活动期间垂青于我。现在我已经拥有如此多的财富以至于我能毫无障碍地花掉它们。尽管如此，我还是希望能得到一片符合我这个级别的战士的自己的国度，因此，我提议我们做一个小交易。

此致，
你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]」

original: I have butterflies in my stomach!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Haruriyyah Order
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]成为了哈鲁里耶教团的一名成员。

original: This map mode shows all independent Realms and it's substructure.
translation: 该地图显示所有独立领地及其下属结构。

original: Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Sub-Realms of §Y$REALM$§!
translation: 按§GCtrl + 左键§!显示§Y$REALM$§!的下级领地

original: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Sub-Realms of §Y$REALM$§!
translation: 按§GCtrl + 右键§!隐藏§Y$REALM$§!的下级领地

original: This map mode shows the different governments.
translation: 该地图模式显示不同的政体。

original: It's time to rescind that old and absurd decree banning Jews from the realm.
translation: 是时候废除领地内的犹太人禁令这一陈旧而荒谬的法令了。

original: Let such injustices be consigned to history.
translation: 把这些不公扔进历史的废纸堆里吧。

original: §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will become the primary settlement in §Y$COUNTY$§!.\n
I can make this holding the county capital of this county.
translation: 我可以让此地产成为这个省份的首府。

original: Warriors serving with your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] have sent word to inform you that they have recently observed a marked improvement in [From.GetHerHis] military leadership abilities.
translation: 侍奉你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]的战士送信通知你，他们最近注意到了[From.GetHerHis]军事领导能力突飞猛进。

original: There is no substitute for experience!
translation: 没有东西可以替代实战经验！

original: Rumors reach you regarding [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], the mercenary. You always knew him as a coward, but now the word is that [From.GetSheHe] has been cured of [From.GetHerHis] shameful fear of battle.
translation: 有关你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]，那个佣兵的消息传到了你的耳中。你熟知的他是一个胆小鬼，然而消息表明[From.GetSheHe]已经治好了[From.GetHerHis]对那令人羞愧的对战场的恐惧。
终于，我的[GetFromRelation]成为了一名真正的[From.GetManWoman]！

original: Life as a mercenary seems to have hardened your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Words of [From.GetHerHis] courage in battle reach you every so often.
translation: 佣兵生活似乎在磨砺你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]。有关[From.GetHerHis]战场上英勇的表现不时的传入你的耳中。

original: It is said that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has become known as a very energetic and tenacious mercenary leader.
translation: 据说，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]成为了一名精力充沛、靠谱的佣兵团团长。

original: People say that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has changed since [From.GetSheHe] took up leadership of [From.GetHerHis] mercenary band. [From.GetSheHeCap] now rarely shows the kindness to others that [From.GetSheHe] used to be known for.
translation: 自从你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]开始领导[From.GetHerHis]佣兵团以来，人们说[From.GetSheHe]已经改变了。[From.GetSheHeCap]很少像[From.GetSheHe]曾经那样对别人展露善心。

original: It is said that [From.GetHerHis] time as a mercenary leader has changed the outlook of your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] no longer shows the same humble spirit as before.
translation: 据说，[From.GetHerHis]在佣兵团的那段时光彻底的改变了你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]。[From.GetSheHeCap]不再像以前一样谦逊了。

original: A predictable effect of [From.GetHerHis] station, surely.
translation: 对[From.GetHerHis]情况来说，这样的结果是意料之中的。

original: During [From.GetHerHis] time as a mercenary leader, your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has become quite famed for [From.GetHerHis] taste for lustful escapades.
translation: 在[From.GetHerHis]作为佣兵领袖的生涯中，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]变得颇为有名，因为[From.GetHerHis]对风流韵事的爱好。

original: Perhaps it was only to be expected.
translation: 大概这是命中注定的吧。

original: It is said that the mercenaries who serve in your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s band all have come to fear [From.GetHerHis] frequent outbursts of rage.
translation: 据说，那些在你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]的佣兵队中服役的人，对于[From.GetHerHis]经常爆发的愤怒感到恐惧。
我很确信他们会这么觉得。

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has gained a reputation as a very cruel mercenary leader.
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]，作为一名残暴的佣兵团团长已经遐迩闻名。

original: People had best not get in [From.GetHerHis] way.
translation: 那些人最好不要挡了[From.GetHerHis]道。

original: News reach you that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has fought a glorious battle against [FromFrom.GetTitledName].
translation: 你收到了消息，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]在对抗[FromFrom.GetTitledName]的战争中打了一场漂亮的胜仗。

original: Mercenary leaders frequently have to deal with people of foreign cultures and religions. Now people are saying that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has developed a particular interest in the [merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName] ways.
translation: 佣兵团的团长时常要和外国人以及异教徒打交道。现在人们都说，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]对[merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName]的生活方式表现出了特别的兴趣。

original: You receive news that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has converted to the [merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 你得到了消息，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]已经皈依了[merc_location.Holder.Religion.GetName]信仰。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a lesser union and in the same court as [Recipient.GetHerHis] spouse
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!在婚姻中不是从属地位，或不与[Recipient.GetHerHis]配偶在同一个宫廷里

original: This value represents the satisfaction of the clans in your realm. The clan satisfaction is determined by how equally the realm is split between the clans. Having low clan satisfaction will increase the risk of clan revolts. You can increase clan satisfaction by handing out provinces with empty holdings to your clan vassals.
translation: 这个值代表着你的领地内的部族的满意程度。部族的满意度取决于领地土地在部族之间平均分配的程度。低部族满意度会增加部族叛乱的风险。你可以通过将无建筑省份分给封臣部族来提高部族满意度。

original: This character has a background as an adventurer, which means that they might be somewhat more ambitious than others.
translation: 这个角色曾经有作为冒险者的背景，这意味着他会比其他人更富有野心。

original: This character's family has a history of being mercenaries.
translation: 这个角色的家族有成为佣兵的传统。

original: It is said that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has turned into a very experienced mercenary commander.
translation: 据传言，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]成为了一名经验丰富的佣兵指挥官。

original: You have heard interesting rumors at court about your father's past as a mercenary commander.
translation: 你在宫廷内听到了许多有关你父亲过去作为佣兵指挥官的轶事。

original: I should ask my guardian [Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] about it.
translation: 我应该问问我的监护人[Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]这件事。

original: My ward, [From.GetTitledFirstName], is asking me about [From.GetHerHis] father's past as a mercenary.
translation: 我的受监护人，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，向我询问[From.GetHerHis]父亲作为佣兵的往事。

original: Ah, do I have stories for [From.GetHerHim]...
translation: 噢，我确实有听说[From.GetHerHim]的一些事……

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is asking me about my past as a mercenary.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]正在问我一些过去作为佣兵的事迹。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] stayed up late into the night, and [From.GetSheHe] told me many stories of my father's past adventures.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]熬到了深夜，[From.GetSheHe]向我讲述许多我父亲过去的冒险故事。

original: Apparently there was a fight between your son and the mercenary [From.GetDynName]. As luck would have it, no one came to harm.
translation: 显然你的儿子和佣兵[From.GetDynName]之间产生了争斗。所幸无人伤亡。

original: I am glad it ended well.
translation: 我非常高兴这件事情圆满结束。

original: Apparently your son was in a violent fight with his employer's son. It seems that no one came to harm, however.
translation: 显然你的儿子和他雇主的儿子产生了争斗。不过，无人伤亡。

original: Apparently there was a fight between your son and the mercenary [From.GetDynName]. Your son was wounded.
translation: 显然你的儿子和佣兵[From.GetDynName]之间产生了争斗。你的儿子受伤了。

original: Apparently your son [From.GetFirstName] was in a violent fight with his employer's son, who was lightly injured.
translation: 显然你的儿子[From.GetFirstName]和他雇主的儿子产生了争斗，雇主的儿子受伤了。
希望他下次运气好一点！

original: Apparently there was a fight between your son and the mercenary [From.GetDynName]. Your son was maimed in the fight.
translation: 显然你的儿子和佣兵[From.GetDynName]之间产生了争斗。你的儿子在这次争斗中残废了。

original: Apparently your son [From.GetFirstName] was in a violent fight with his employer's son, who was maimed.
translation: 显然你的儿子[From.GetFirstName]和他雇主的儿子产生了争斗，雇主的儿子残废了。

original: New reach you that your son has been killed in a fight with the mercenary [From.GetDynName].
translation: 你收到了消息，你的儿子在和雇佣兵[From.GetDynName]争斗时丧生了。

original: I will have my revenge, I swear it!
Apparently your son [From.GetFirstName] was in a violent fight with his employer's son, who was killed.
translation: 很明显你的儿子[From.GetFirstName]和他雇主的儿子发生了十分严重的争斗，雇主的儿子在争斗中身亡了。

original: That mercenary band that you hired a while back seems to still be in the region.... maybe you should invite the commander to a small feast?
translation: 之前你雇佣的佣兵团现在依然驻扎在你的领地内……或许你应该邀请指挥官小酌一杯？

original: No, mercenaries are best kept at a proper distance.
translation: 还是别了，佣兵还是离我远一点好。

original: [From.GetDynName] came to feast with you and you found that you have much in common.
translation: [From.GetDynName]前来参加了你的宴会，你发现你们二人居然有如此多的共同之处。

original: A new friend, maybe I should give [From.GetHerHim] some land...
translation: 一位新朋友，或许我应该赐予[From.GetHerHim]一点土地……

original: [From.GetTitledName] refused to come and feast with you.
Is not over Trade Post Limit (§Y$TRADE_POSTS$§!/§Y$MAX_TRADE_POSTS$§!)
Cannot Call Tribal or Nomadic Vassals since you are not an independent ruler.
translation: 由于你不是一个独立领主，你无法召唤部落或游牧封臣。

original: Tribal Levy Laws control the obligations of tribes to provide troops for their liege.
translation: 部落征召法律控制着部落为领主提供军队的义务。

original: The Tribes are expected to provide a small amount of troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 部落领主只需要提供少量的士兵来守卫领地。

original: The Tribes are expected to provide a moderate amount of troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 部落领主需要提供适量的士兵来守卫领地。

original: The Tribes are expected to provide a substantial amount of troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 部落领主需要提供大量的士兵来守卫领地。

original: The Tribes are expected to provide a large amount of troops for the defense of the realm.
translation: 部落领主需要提供尽可能多的士兵来守卫领地。

original: Tribes do not generate much gold, but their taxation can be adjusted by laws.
translation: 部落产生不了太多金钱，但是他们的税率可以通过法律来调节。

original: Tribes are expected to make a small financial contribution to the greater good of the realm.
translation: 为了领地的福祉，部落领主需要上交少量税金。

original: Tribes are expected to make a moderate financial contribution to the greater good of the realm.
translation: 为了领地的福祉，部落领主需要上交适量税金。

original: Tribes are expected to make a substantial financial contribution to the greater good of the realm.
translation: 为了领地的福祉，部落领主需要上交大量税金。

original: \nYou cannot create this Horde, your §YMaximum Manpower§! size has been reached.
translation: \n你不能创建这个游牧军，你已经达到了§Y最大人力§!.。

original: \nYou cannot create this retinue, you do not have enough §YManpower§!.
translation: \n你不能创建这个近卫军，你没有足够的§Y人力§!。

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have an available commander slot that §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! can hold
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须还有能授予给§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!的空缺指挥官席位。

original: With the death of §Y$CLAN$§!, the mighty clan §Y$DYNASTY$§! has become extinct.
translation: 随着§Y$CLAN$§!的死亡，强大的§Y$DYNASTY$§!部族最终走向了灭亡。

original: A new clan has risen in $TITLE_ADJ$, under §Y$CLAN$§!.
translation: 一个新的部族在§Y$CLAN$§!的领导下于$TITLE_ADJ$崛起。

original: My husband, [From.GetName], has in a sudden fit of religious piety gone off to join the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This effectively annuls our marriage...
translation: 我的丈夫，[From.GetName]，出于突如其来的宗教感召而加入了[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。这一行为宣告我们之间的婚姻无效……

original: My husband, [FromFromFrom.GetName], has gone off to join the [FromFromFrom.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This effectively annuls our marriage...
translation: 我的丈夫，[FromFromFrom.GetName]，选择离开我去加入[FromFromFrom.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。这一行为宣告我们之间的婚姻无效……

original: My husband, [From.GetName], has gone off to join the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This effectively annuls our marriage...
translation: 我的丈夫，[From.GetName]，选择离开我去加入[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。这一行为宣告我们之间的婚姻无效……

original: Any gold this unit loots will be added to its owner's treasury directly, since it is a raiding adventurer.
translation: 由于这是一位劫掠冒险者，任何这支队伍掠夺到的金子都会直接送到其主人的财库中。

original: §YHorde is set to reinforce at half speed.§!
§YHorde is set to reinforce at maximum speed.§!
§YSet Horde to reinforce at half speed.§!
§YSet Horde to reinforce at maximum speed.§!
Create a §Y$NAME$§! horde, this will start out almost empty but reinforce up to the specified size.
translation: 创建一支§Y$NAME$§!游牧军，这支部队初始为空但会逐渐增援到一定规模。
\n§R所有游牧军部队都将会解散！§!

original: \nYou cannot create this Horde, you cannot afford it.
translation: \n你不能创建这支游牧军，你无法负担其费用。

original: $WHO$ does not have at least §Y$NEED$§! unused manpower
translation: $WHO$没有至少 §Y$NEED$§! 的未使用人力

original: §YHorde§!\nThese numbers are the current size of your Horde and the maintenance you pay for it.
translation: §Y游牧军§!\n这些数字是你现有的游牧军的规模以及为了维持它需要的花费。

original: Your Horde is your personal professional and standing army ready to do as you order at all times. Your Horde is always on the map and reinforce slowly. The maximum number of Horde regiments you can field depends on your §YMaximum Manpower§!, which is determined by your §YMaximum Population§!.
translation: 你的游牧军是你的私人专业且常设部队，随时整装待发接受你的命令。游牧军会一直出现在地图上，并会缓慢增援。你能够部署的最大游牧军团数量取决于你的§Y最大人力§!，这个值由你的§Y最大人口数§!决定。

original: Your Retinue is your personal professional and standing army ready to do as you order at all times. Unlike Army Levies, retinues are always on the map and reinforce slowly. The maximum number of retinue regiments you can field depends on your §YMilitary Organization§! technology and the size of all the levies in your realm.
translation: 你的近卫军是一支随时待命并仅服从于你命令的专业部队。不同于征召兵，近卫军将持续出现在地图上并缓慢补充兵力。近卫军军团的最大数目取决于你的§Y军事组织§!科技以及你领地内征召兵的总兵力。

original: $CLAN$ holds only §R$EMPTY_HOLDINGS$§! empty holdings compared to liege's §Y$LIEGE_EMPTY_HOLDINGS$§!.
translation: $CLAN$仅持有 §R$EMPTY_HOLDINGS$§! 空地产，相比起领主的 §Y$LIEGE_EMPTY_HOLDINGS$§!。

original: Empty holdings in nomad capital are not included when calculating clan satisfaction.
translation: 游牧首都内的空地产在计算部族满意度时将不被包括在内。

original: Title is not a Clan title
Title cannot be a clan title

translation: 移除§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!之前的任何宗主国\n

original: You have decadent relatives. You should ask them to straighten up or in other ways take care of them.
translation: 你有腐化的亲戚。你应该要求他们改正或者以其他方式处理他们。

original: Your dynasty is seen as hopelessly decadent. There is a risk of a massive revolt.
translation: 你的家族被认为完全腐化了。有大规模叛乱的风险。

original: The Clans in your realm are deeply dissatisfied with the current distribution of land. There is a risk of a Clan revolt.
translation: 你领地的部族对当前的土地分配并不感到满意。有部族大规模反叛的风险。

original: Province is located on a major trade route
translation: 省份位于一条主要贸易线路上

original: Clan revolts can rise up if the clan satisfaction is too low, and will try to better distribute the lands in a nomadic realm.
translation: 部族满意度过低时，部族叛乱就会出现，将尽力在游牧领地内更好地重新分配土地。

original: This is a small but vibrant trading post on the Silk Road.
translation: 这是丝绸之路上的一个规模虽小但充满生机的贸易站。

original: This Silk Road trading post has grown into a large town, offering more protection against raiders and brigands and thus attracting more merchants who prefer to stay here and trade.
translation: 这个丝绸之路贸易站已经发展成为一个大城镇，能够提供更多应对土匪强盗的保护，因此吸引了更多愿意留在这里贸易的商人。

original: This is a major trading hub on the Silk Road, where merchants come from all directions to trade their wares. All goods and services known to civilized man can be found here, and a myriad of languages echo through the many streets and alleys.
translation: 这是丝绸之路上主要的贸易中心，在这里，来自四面八方的商人们交易着他们的货物。一切你能喊得出名字的商品和服务都可以在这里找到，形形色色的语言回荡在大街小巷间。

original: Another clan has risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
translation: 另一个部族在[From.GetName]反叛了，他们加入了当前的叛乱！

original: Isabelle was born in 1212 in southern Italy as the only child of Maria de Montferrat, Queen of Jerusalem. Her mother died shortly after giving birth, and the newborn Isabelle was proclaimed Queen with her father Jean de Brienne acting as her regent. At the age of 13, Isabelle was wed to the Holy Roman Emperor Friedrich II, effectively being used as a pawn to encourage the Emperor to participate in the Fifth Crusade. The wedding saw the Emperor crowned King of Jerusalem and Isabelle’s father stripped of all his powers. Isabelle herself was kept in seclusion by her husband. She lost a baby daughter before herself dying while giving birth to her son Conrad in 1228. Shortly after her death, Friedrich finally embarked on the promised crusade.
translation: 伊莎贝拉，作为耶路撒冷女王蒙费拉的玛丽的独生女，于1212年出生于意大利南部。她的母亲在生产后不久便去世了，刚出生没多久的伊莎贝拉加冕为女王，由她的父亲约翰·德·布列讷摄政。在13岁时，伊莎贝拉嫁给了神圣罗马帝国皇帝腓特烈二世，作为有效促使皇帝参加第五次十字军远征的抵押。这次婚礼见证了腓特烈二世加冕成为耶路撒冷国王，而她的父亲被剥夺了所有权力。伊莎贝拉此后被丈夫软禁。她生前失去了一个女婴，但在1228年生下儿子康拉德。在她离世不久后，腓特烈终于发起了允诺的十字军。

original: Inheriting the Khwarezmian Empire after the death of his father, Mohammed was immediately faced with an invasion by the Ghurids. Several chaotic years of intermittent war between the Khwarezmids, Ghurids and the Kara-Khitans ensued. Mohammed was at one point taken prisoner and held captive in the Kara-Khitan Khanate for a year, but changing fortunes would see him come out on top against his enemies, and he eventually managed to conquer Samarkand, Balochistan and Afghanistan and declare himself Shah. His reign came to an end sooner than expected, however, as Genghis Khan and the Mongols entered the scene in 1218. Within two short years, the Mongols had overrun his domain and he died a fugitive on a small island in the Caspian Sea in 1220.
translation: 在父亲去世后继承了花剌子模帝国后，摩诃末马上便遭遇了古尔王朝的入侵。接踵而至的是花剌子模与古尔王朝以及喀喇契丹的数年三方混战。摩诃末一度沦为阶下囚并被喀喇契丹汗国囚禁了一年，但是捉摸不透的命运将会引领他在面对他的敌人时再次重新占上风，最终他设法征服了撒马尔罕，俾路支斯坦和阿富汗并自称为沙阿。然而，随着成吉思汗和蒙古1218年登上历史舞台，他的统治结束得比预想中的要早。只用了短短的两年，蒙古人践踏了他的土地，而他作为一个逃亡者于1220年在里海的一个小岛上去世。

original: Mystery surrounds Iltutmish’s early years, though it is said he was named for an eclipse that occurred during his birth. He was sold into slavery at an early age, and eventually ended up being bought by Aibak, the ruler of Lahore. Aibak valued his new servant highly and kept giving Iltutmish increasing responsibilities and corresponding honors, eventually marrying him to his own daughter. When Aibak died in 1210, Iltutmish enjoyed strong support as he claimed the throne. Years of turmoil ensued as he fought off contenders and then strengthened his position. He subsequently managed to avoid open conflict with the Mongols, founding the Delhi Sultanate that was to last into the 16th century.
translation: 伊勒杜迷失苏丹的早年生活充斥着各种谜团，据传言他的名字源于他出生时的日蚀。幼年时，他被卖给奴隶贩子，最终被拉合尔的统治者艾伊拜克买下。艾伊拜克很赏识他的这位新仆人，给予伊勒杜迷失越来越高的职权与相应的荣耀，甚至将自己的亲女儿许配给他。当艾伊拜克于 1210 年去世后，伊勒杜迷失在宣称王位时得到了强力的拥护。在伊勒杜迷失与其他王位竞争者的斗争持续的数年时间，国家陷入混乱，直到其最终稳固了自己的地位。他接下来设法避免了与蒙古人的正面冲突，建立了持续到十六世纪的德里苏丹国。

original: Temujin was born in Mongolia, the son of the leader of the Borjigin clan. He was only a child when his father died, and he and his mother were ostracized from the clan due to his young age and competing pretenders. Once he reached maturity, however, Temujin began to forge his own destiny. Over several decades, he increased his reputation and prestige among his people, and eventually led them in the successful conquest of all Mongolia. After this, he went on to conquer northern China, all of Central Asia and parts of Persia and the western steppes. He became recognized as one of the greatest conquerors in the history of humanity, and the Mongols would continue expanding on these conquests after his death.
translation: 铁木真出生于蒙古，是孛儿只斤氏首领的儿子。他是他父亲去世时唯一的孩子，而他与他的母亲由于铁木真年纪尚轻而被竞争者放逐出部族。然而他一成年，铁木真便开始一手开创他自己的命运。在几十年间，铁木真在他的民众不断提升自己的名声和威望，最终带领着他们征服了整个蒙古。在此之后，他一举征服了中国北部，整个中亚，部分波斯和西部大草原。他被认为是人类历史上最伟大的一位征服者，蒙古人在他去世后也继续在这征服的基础上进行扩张。

original: Cannot Call Tribal or Nomadic Vassals as they give us Liege Levies instead
translation: 不能动员部落或游牧封臣，他们只向我们提供领主征召兵

original: Cannot Call Tribal or Nomadic Vassals since you are not Tribal
translation: 不能动员部落封臣，因为你不是部落

original: Call all Tribal and Nomadic Vassals to War
translation: 召唤所有部落封臣加入战争

original: Empty Holding slots actually provide more population and manpower for Nomads, which allows bigger armies and more taxes. To build proper Holdings you need to become either a Feudal state or a Republic (check your Decisions.)
translation: 空地产格其实为游牧民提供更多的人口和人力，也就是更庞大的军队和更多的税收。要建造真正的地产你需要成为一个封建国家或一个共和国（查看你的决议）。

original: §Y$TARGET$§! is your bitter rival and you can't imagine anything better than throwing the blighter into your dungeons.
translation: §Y$TARGET$§!是你的憎恶的仇人，除了把这个坏蛋扔进你的地牢之外，你想不到更好的处置方法了。
针对我朝贡国的朝贡战争

original: A traveller from the east reaches your court along with his personal bodyguard. Reading from a scroll, he states that the Great Emperor of China demands a tribute of a thousand 'heavenly horses' from your lands.
translation: 一个东方来的旅者带着他的护卫来到了你的宫廷。他读着一个卷轴，告诉我们中国至高无上的皇帝要求我们的土地进贡一千匹「天马」。

original: These are the finest and strongest horses.
translation: 这些都是最精良强壮的马。

original: Your Emperor has no power here!
translation: 这是我们的地盘，你们的皇帝在这里没有权力！

original: Another envoy from China arrives at your court. He tells you that he himself is a gift - a token of gratitude from the Emperor - and that he is an excellent governor of trade if you need his services.
translation: 中国的另一个使节来到了你的朝廷。他告诉你他自己就是中国的礼物——代表中国皇帝的感激，并且说他是一个优秀的财政总管，如果你需要的话他会为你服务。

original: I'll let him govern the trade.
I've noticed an increase in traders coming from the east since I employed [chinese_envoy.GetBestName] as a trade governor.
translation: 我发现自从雇佣了[chinese_envoy.GetBestName]作为贸易总管后，东方商人到来的数量增加了。

original: [chinese_envoy.GetBestName] has managed to acquire a collection of rare gemstones on your behalf.
translation: [chinese_envoy.GetBestName]设法为你取得了一些稀有的宝石。

original: These will fit great in a pendant.
translation: 它们镶在项链上肯定很合适。

original: I'll make some earrings for my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].
translation: 我会为我的[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]做一些耳环。

original: A couple of travelling merchants claim that their goods were stolen while they stayed on your premises.
translation: 几个旅行商人称他们的货物在你的土地内被偷了。

original: Enthusiastic and blabbering [chinese_envoy.GetFirstName] pulls a large sack into the room. [chinese_envoy.GetSheHeCap] apparently found valuable goods laying on the premises and wants to share it with you.
translation: 无比激动又滔滔不绝的[chinese_envoy.GetFirstName]拉着一个大麻袋走进了房间，[chinese_envoy.GetSheHeCap]显然在领地内找到了什么宝贵的货物并且想和你分享。

original: I wonder if this is just a coincidence?
Find the merchants and return their lost cargo.
translation: 找到商人并归还他们丢失的货物。

original: [From.GetBestName] entered my chamber with [From.GetHerHis] newly acquired pet snake wrapped around [From.GetHerHis] neck. [From.GetSheHeCap] asks if I want to pet it.
translation: [From.GetBestName]带着他[From.GetHerHis]最近刚得到的宠物蛇走进了我的会客室，他的宠物蛇环绕在[From.GetHerHis]脖子上。[From.GetSheHeCap]问我想不想摸摸它。

original: I hear a scream outside and rush out only to see [From.GetFirstName]'s snake swallowing the dog of [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in a single gulp.
translation: 我听到外面传来一声尖叫然后就马上冲了出去，只见[From.GetFirstName]的宠物蛇正在吞下[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的狗。

original: Someone slay that beast before it does more harm!
translation: 来人把那野兽给宰了免得更多的伤亡！

original: I hear a dog barking outside and rush out only to see [From.GetFirstName]'s dastardly snake swallowing my beloved dog in a single gulp.
translation: 我听到一声狗吠声然后马上冲了出去，只见[From.GetFirstName]天杀的蛇正在吞咽我最爱的狗。

original: You are out taking a walk together with [FromFrom.GetFirstName] when [From.GetFirstName] approaches you with a concern. According to Chinese law [From.GetSheHe] is required to get a woman to continue his services more permanently.
translation: 当你在和[FromFrom.GetFirstName]一起散步的时候，[From.GetFirstName]一脸担忧地走向了你。根据中国的法律，[From.GetSheHe]需要找到一个女人来更长久地为你服务。

original: Ahem.. We were just discussing that matter, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Right?
translation: 呃……我们等会再讨论这，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。好吗？

original: I guess I have no more need of your services then.
translation: 我想我不再需要你的服务了。

original: Dust rise in your wake as you head for the local tavern with heavy steps. As you enter, you instantly notice [From.GetFirstName], seemingly involved in a game of chance. You approach [From.GetHerHim] and realize that [From.GetSheHe] is betting your money on games of chance... and losing. [From.GetFirstName] looks up at you with a smile and says: 'Hey. Your drinksch are taschty'.
translation: 你迈着重重的步子前去当地的旅馆，尘土在你脚下飞扬。当你进去后，你马上注意到[From.GetFirstName]，似乎参与了某种赌博游戏。你靠近[From.GetHerHim]，然后意识到[From.GetSheHe]正在用你的钱赌博……而且还输了。[From.GetFirstName]抬头看着你，带着一丝微笑，说：「嘿，你的giu真好ho~」

original: Just stay away from these people.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I hereby inform you that I'm leaving the position at your court because of the less than preferable way that you have treated me.

Signed
[From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我来这里是为了告诉你我要辞去我在你宫廷里的这个职位，因为你对我的待遇实在太糟糕了。

此致，
[From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

Your insolence has not gone unnoticed. I will henceforth punish all travellers who are suspected of having have visited your city. 

Signed,
The Emperor.
translation:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

你的傲慢无礼已经被注意到了。从今以后我会惩罚每一个可能到过你城市的旅行者。

此致，
皇帝。

original: This could be bad for trade.
translation: 这对贸易来说真是太糟了。

original: Reports have reached us that traders and travellers are being harassed by raiders in your lands of [Root.GetName].
translation: 最近的报告指出商人和旅行者正受到你领土[Root.GetName]上的强盗侵扰。

original: I'll let them continue if they share the loot.
translation: 我会睁一只眼闭一只眼，如果他们愿意分我一杯羹。

original: Send my marshal to hunt them down.
translation: 派出我的军事总管把他们都拿下。

original: Ready my horse. I'll get rid of the scoundrel.
translation: 备好我的马，我亲自去除掉那些混蛋。

original: Nomads do not generate technology points.
translation: 游牧制不会产出科技点数。

original: Your government doesn't allow you to build this.
translation: 你的政体不允许建造这个。

original: I can declare this my primary title.
translation: 我可宣告此为我的主头衔。

original:
For too long, you have restricted our rights. The time has come to Lower Tribal Organization! With your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], among my supporters you have no other choice than to accept.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你已限制我们的权利太久。是时候降低部落组织度了！你的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]也在我的支持者之中，你除了接受已经没有别的选择。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Empty Holding slots actually provide more troops for Tribes. To build proper Holdings you need to become either a Feudal state or a Republic (check your Decisions.)
translation: 空地产格其实为部落提供更多部队。如要建造真正的地产，你需要先成为一个封建国家或共和国（查看你的决议）。

original: Difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§!'s Trade Posts lower than §Y$VAL$§!
Difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§!'s Trade Posts at least §Y$VAL$§!
